original_title: Breaking the Code: Behind the Walls of Chris Jericho
overview: Chris Jericho has stolen the spotlight for nearly twenty years, becoming one of the most recognized WWE Superstars in sports-entertainment history. From his early days in Germany, Mexico, and Japan through ECW, WCW, and ultimately, WWE, Chris Jericho has demonstrated he is an exceptional talent in the ring and on the mic.
title: Breaking the Code: Behind the Walls of Chris Jericho
